data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Atlas.
In the minute 2, Atlas's Ignacio Malcorra gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Queretaro throw-in in Atlas's half.
In the minute 4, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atlas take a 1-0 lead thanks to Edgar Zaldivar.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Atlas.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Jalisco.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 12, Alejandro Funk Villafane awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Atlas have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Queretaro drive forward but Kevin Ramirez is judged offside.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Queretaro are in shooting range from this free kick.
Queretaro drive upfield and Kevin Ramirez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atlas defender.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Atlas.
In the minute 26, Alejandro Funk Villafane awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Queretaro pushes forward through Angel Sepulveda, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
In the minute 33, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Atlas's Ignacio Malcorra is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
In the minute 36, Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Atlas will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Queretaro.
Javier Correa (Atlas) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Queretaro drives forward and Angel Sepulveda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Queretaro in Guadalajara.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 39, Free kick Queretaro.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a throw-in for Queretaro, close to Atlas's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Atlas.
Atlas have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
The match at Estadio Jalisco has been interrupted briefly for a check on German Conti, who is down injured.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Atlas's German Conti is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in Queretaro.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Luciano Acosta returns to the field for Atlas after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 45, Atlas are coming forward and Jesus Isijara gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Alejandro Funk Villafane awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, At Estadio Jalisco, Hugo Silveira has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Alejandro Funk Villafane waits before resuming play because Luciano Acosta for Atlas is still down.
In the minute 45, Daniel Cervantes (Queretaro) gets a yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Queretaro make their second substitution with Julio Nava replacing Erik Vera.
In the minute 47, Alejandro Funk Villafane awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Angel Sepulveda with Francisco Da Costa.
In the minute 48, Free kick Atlas.
Irving Zurita is booked for the away team.
Queretaro needs to be cautious. Atlas have an attacking throw-in.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 51, Francisco Da Costa (Queretaro) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 57, Queretaro's Hugo Silveira misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 58, Ignacio Malcorra for Atlas has been booked by Alejandro Funk Villafane and receives a first yellow card.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Edgar Zaldivar (Atlas) has received a yellow card from Alejandro Funk Villafane.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Francisco Da Costa (Queretaro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 64, Nicolas Albarracin is replacing Fernando Madrigal for the away team.
Ignacio Malcorra is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ignacio Malcorra is back on the pitch.
In the minute 66, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Renato Ibarra (Atlas) has replaced the possibly injured Ignacio Malcorra.
In the minute 69, Renato Ibarra of Atlas is pulled up for offside.
Alex Diego (Queretaro) is making a fourth substitution, with Omar Islas replacing Irving Zurita.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 71, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Queretaro throw-in in Atlas's half.
Alejandro Funk Villafane awards Atlas a goal kick.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Queretaro throw-in in Atlas's half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Guadalajara to check on Luciano Acosta, who is grimacing with pain.
Luciano Acosta is back on his feet again.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Atlas have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 77, Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 79, Atlas's Luciano Acosta has been booked in Guadalajara.
Luciano Acosta (Atlas) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Edyairth Ortega.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Jonathan Betancourt is on a sub for Hugo Silveira for Queretaro.
Atlas to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 85, Atlas's Renato Ibarra has run offside.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
In Guadalajara, Martin Rea of Queretaro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 86, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team replace Javier Correa with Ignacio Jeraldino.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Jalisco.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Jalisco.
Alejandro Funk Villafane will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Atlas.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Nicolas Albarracin of Queretaro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Alejandro Funk Villafane awards Atlas a goal kick.
Free kick Queretaro.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
